Class SolrDataDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.synovite.mvctest.solr.SolrBaseDAO
      • org.synovite.mvctest.solr.SolrDataDAO

  • @Component
public class SolrDataDAO
extends SolrBaseDAO
    This class is used to add, delete and query data from Solr
